name: Shapes of Doom
description:
Version: 1.4

Bradley is a superhero who has to fly up and down to dodge shapes for no particular reason. Or is there?

Here's the story.

Bradley got superpowers a couple of years ago and he recently discovered that he could fly. So one thing led to another and before you no it an evil villain starts putting shapes in the sky. There are circles and triangles and squares. Bradley hasn't discovered all of his powers yet so there might be a couple of more games with Bradley coming your way.

There's one thing that you need to know about the shapes. They never stop and they will get faster and faster.

Features:
  • 3 shapes set out on a mission to destroy you.
  • The Awesome bonus shape, The golden hexagon.
  • The shapes speed increases.
